          <title>
            <string language="fr">Une graine de plante</string>
            <string language="en">A plant seed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Betriebsstartwert für Zufallsgenerator</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma semente da planta</string>

          </title>

          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre un exemple d'une graine et de ses parties spécialisées qui facilitent sa dispersion.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an example of a seed and its specialised parts that aid in its dispersion.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Beispiel eines 
Startwertes für Zufallsgenerator und seine fachkundigen Teile, die in
seiner Zerstreuung helfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostram um exemplo de uma 
semente e suas peças especializadas que ajudam em sua dispersão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un esempio di un seme
e le relative parti specializzate che aiutano nella relativa 
dispersione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα παράδειγμα ενός 
σπόρου και των εξειδικευμένων μερών της που βοηθούν στη διασπορά 
του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un ejemplo de un germen
y sus piezas especializadas que ayudan en su dispersión.</string>
